products.name: NY Bae Makeup Primer (15 g)
products.description: A start of an 'on-point' make-up face is not possible without a primer and thus NY Bae Makeup Primer is here at your rescue. Look no less than a runway model with that perfect base you create. This formulation is made to blur out the imperfections of your skin and prepare a clean canvas for the rest of your makeup to go on. Minimum efforts for maximum result.

products.name: Blue Heaven Studio Perfection Primer (30 g)
products.description: Use the Studio Perfection Primer under your makeup to make sure that your makeup looks fresh all day & stays on for hours! It is an amazing base for your makeup and is oil-free & non-greasy.

products.name: Blue Heaven Makeup Fixer - Mist Spray Formula (115 ml)
products.description: You definitely do not want heat and perspiration to take over your makeup, right? Blue Heaven Make Up Fixer helps in setting your makeup for a longer stay & making it difficult to wiped off with touch or run off with perspiration.

products.name: SUGAR Cosmetics The Base Of Glory Pore Minimizing Primer 30 ml
products.description: Ladies, you have got yourself a winner. The much-awaited and the most radiant superstar, The Base Of Glory Pore Minimizing Primer is here! This satiny-smooth, luxurious wonder is a lifesaver for the girl on-the-go! Wear it alone or under makeup, its weightless texture and no-clog no-block formula mattifies on your skin perfectly, minimizes shine and keeps excess oil at bay and that‚Äôs not all. A little goes a long way with this skin-perfector, as a pea-sized amount creates the definition of a flawless base whilst blurring out wrinkles and fine lines. Making your skin the smoothest canvas for all the beauty to follow, this primer is surely a fan-favourite!.

products.name: Bella Voste Primer (30 ml)
products.description: Bella Voste Hi Definition Primer is a balmy primer which can be used alone as a professional natural touch up or as a perfect base for any Make-Up.

products.name: Stay Quirky First Base Primer Oil (10 ml)
products.description: Stay Quirky brings you the revolutionary formula of the effect of a primer with the moisturization & nourishment of oil. Stay Quirky First Base Primer Oil absorbs into the skin seamlessly and gives a perfect base for the all your makeup looks. The oil-based formula of the Primer comprises Olive Oil that enhances the skin tone & improves the skin texture. It makes the skin supple & soft while giving a feature like a smooth finish.

products.name: Blue Heaven Makeup Fixer - Mist Spray Formula (115 ml)
products.description: You definitely do not want heat and perspiration to take over your makeup, right? Blue Heaven Make Up Fixer helps in setting your makeup for a longer stay & making it difficult to wiped off with touch or run off with perspiration.

products.name: Colorbar Perfect Match Primer (30 ml)
products.description: Colorbar Perfect Match Primer this satiny touch oil free primer masks the fine lines.

products.name: Shakti‚Äôs Festive Ready Combo by Shakti by NY Bae
products.description: NY Bae brings for you Shakti‚Äôs Festive Ready Combo by Shakti by NY Bae. Bring out your best Diva makeup look and look gorgeous with Shakti's makeup favorites directly from her closet! This combo features Shakti By NY Bae Liquid Eyeliner Black - Cha-Cha-Cha (4.5 ml), Shakti By NY Bae Liquid Lipstick Purple - Ballet Babe 1 (2.7 ml), Shakti By NY Bae Nail Lacquer Chameleon Effect Pink - Midtown Mambo 4 (9ml).

products.name: Purplle Ultra HD Matte Mini Liquid Lipstick, Red - My First Hook-up 11 (1.6 ml)
products.description: Ah, that bitter-sweet memory of the time you had that 'no-strings-attached' time with 'the-person-who-should-not-be-named'. Look as sexy as that day with Purplle's My First Hook-up Mini Liquid Lipstick. A minimized solution for a dressed up lip.

products.name: Alps Goodness Liquorice Toner (100ml)
products.description: Cleanse and add glow to your skin with the revitalizing properties of Liquorice. Alps Goodness Liquorice Toner helps clear impurities from the skin, detoxifies it while also rejuvenating it and making you feel fresh, thus seeping into your skin to add an extra glow to your complexion!

products.name: Good Vibes Glow Toner - Green Tea (120 ml)
products.description: Good Vibes Toner - Green Tea is a lightweight, alcohol-free hydrating face toner. It effectively balances skin‚Äôs pH levels, minimizes the appearance of visible pores and instantly refreshes skin. Green tea helps in reducing the appearance of dark spots, dark circles and blemishes thereby enhancing the skin complexion and improving skin tone. The antibacterial and astringent properties of Green Tea inhibit the growth of acne causing bacteria and regulate excess sebum production. Being anti-inflammatory in nature, Green Tea prevents skin irritation, reduces redness and soothes inflamed skin.

products.name: Just Herbs Ayurvedic Glow Boosting Trial Kit Pack of 3
products.description: The Ayurvedic Glow Boosting trial kit contains four of the most effective products, hand-picked from our much raved about 6-Step Regime known for bringing about startling results to the most dull, ageing and/or pigmented skin.

products.name: Good Vibes Glow Face Mask - Papaya (60 g)
products.description: Ladies, you have got yourself a winner. The much-awaited and the most radiant superstar, The Base Of Glory Pore Minimizing Primer is here! This satiny-smooth, luxurious wonder is a lifesaver for the girl on-the-go! Wear it alone or under makeup, its weightless texture and no-clog no-block formula mattifies on your skin perfectly, minimizes shine and keeps excess oil at bay and that‚Äôs not all. A little goes a long way with this skin-perfector, as a pea-sized amount creates the definition of a flawless base whilst blurring out wrinkles and fine lines. Making your skin the smoothest canvas for all the beauty to follow, this primer is surely a fan-favourite!.

products.name: Good Vibes Age Defying Serum - Vitamin C & Vitamin E (10 ml)
products.description: Infused with Vitamin C, this serum stimulates collagen production and protects skin from pollution and ultraviolet rays. Also infused with Vitamin E, it fights off free radicals to prevent wrinkles and fine lines for a youthful-looking complexion.

products.name: Good Vibes Moisture - Rich Face Cream - Rosehip (50 g)
products.description: Good Vibes Moisture Rich Rosehip Face Cream helps to slow down the ageing process of the skin, leaving you with radi¬≠ant and youthful-looking skin. It is rich in antioxidants which assist in rejuvenating the skin and may help to reduce wrinkles and fine lines.

products.name: Biotique Bio Coconut Whitening & Brightening Cream (50 g)
products.description: This luxurious cream is blended with extracts of pure virgin coconut, dandelion and manjishtha to fade away dark spots and blemishes. With regular use, skin is noticeably fairer, smoother and brighter.

products.name: Good Vibes Brightening Face Wash - Papaya (120 ml)
products.description: Crafted with passion, skill, fresh ingredients and skin expertise. After all in life, all you ever need is love, glow on your face and Good Vibes!

products.name: Good Vibes Brightening Facial Oil - Almond (10 ml)
products.description: Good VIbes Skin Brightening Almond Facial Oil provides in-depth nourishment and brightens skin complexion. It lightens the appearance of dark circles. treats uneven skin tone and improves overall skin health. It fortifies the skin's natural barrier and imparts a radiant glow.

products.name: Good Vibes Deep Cleansing Face Wash - Activated Charcoal (120 ml)
products.description: It's time to deeply cleanse your skin with Good Vibes Activated Charcoal Face Wash. Made from charcoal extracts, it pulls out dirt and toxins from deep within and give you a squeaky clean face. Clean pores mean no-blackheads and acne.

products.name: WOW Skin Science Red Onion Black Seed Oil Shampoo (300 ml)
products.description: Get strong and lustrous hair with WOW Skin Science Red Onion Black Seed Oil Shampoo. This shampoo may help tackle hair loss, scalp buildups and dull, weak hair. The shampoo, formulated with natural ingredients, helps strengthen hair follicles and clarify blocked roots.

products.name: Alps Goodness Pure Essential Oil - Tea Tree (10 ml)
products.description: Experience the essence of nature in every drop, with the most powerful healing compounds of the plant extracted and infused in an oil bottle. Alps Goodness Tea Tree Essential Oil is a popular choice for treating acne because of its anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties. It's thought to calm redness, swelling, and inflammation. It may even help to prevent and reduce acne scars, leaving you with smooth, clear skin. The aroma from the oil has therapeutic properties to relieve you from stress. It also works great against dandruff.

products.name: Alps Goodness Powder - Orange Peel (50 g)
products.description: Alps Goodness Orange Peel Powder work as a great cleansing agent that helps to deep clean the scalp and tresses right from their roots. The anti-inflammatory properties of the Orange Peel Powder help to fight scalp infections in an excellent manner. Being a great stimulant for hair growth owing to the surplus of Vitamin C that it contains, this no-chemical orange peel powder happens to be enriched with conditioning benefits that it is likely to get one healthier, shinier and smoother hair.

products.name: Good Vibes 100% Pure Cold Pressed Carrier Oil For Hair & Skin - Coconut (200 ml)
products.description: Give your skin and hair the nourishment they deserve with Good Vibes Cold pressed Coconut Oil. A powerhouse of essential fatty acids, vitamins and minerals, Good Vibes Cold pressed Coconut Oil provides intense nourishment and makes skin and hair healthy. It deeply moisturizes skin, increases skin elasticity, makes skin soft & smooth, provides anti-ageing benefits and adds a natural glow. When applied to hair, it promotes hair growth, prevents breakage & split ends, strengthens hair follicles, naturally conditions hair and makes hair shiny.

products.name: WOW Skin Science Aloe Vera Multipurpose Beauty Gel For Skin & Hair (150 ml)
products.description: The WOW Skin Science Aloe Vera Gel boosts collagen production, leading to powerful antiaging & skin care effects.Moisturizes the skin to prevent dryness, keeps the pores tight to reduce acne & soothes inflammations. Helps soften the hair, reduce dryness, check dandruff & itchy scalp & heal bacterial & fungal infections.

products.name: Alps Goodness Powder - Amla (50 g)
products.description: Amazing amla virtues are brought in powder form for your hair by Alps Goodness Amla Powder. Apart from nourishing and conditioning your hair, it provides the much-needed strength to your scalp and makes it shiny and lustrous. The rich antioxidants of amla also help delay the effects of premature ageing such as fine lines, wrinkles, dark spots and give you a young and supple skin. From curing dandruff and other scalp issues to preventing hair loss to keeping your skin young, Alps Goodness Amla Powder is an all-purpose hair powder you need!

products.name: WOW Skin Science Onion Black Seed Hair Oil (200 ml)
products.description: Made with 100% pure cold pressed oils. Brings silkiness and strength boosts the way hair looks. Excellent for checking hair loss and boosting hair regrowth.

products.name: Livon Serum for Dry & Unruly Hair (50 ml)
products.description: Livon Serum for Dry & Unruly Hair has been specially crafted for dry, rough & excessively frizzy hair which is unmanageable & so hard to control!

products.name: Livon Serum (50 ml)
products.description: New Livon Serum is a hair essential for damage protection.

products.name: Biotique Bio Bhringraj Therapeutic Oil For Falling Hair (120 ml)
products.description: This intensive formula features pure bhringraj, butea frondosa, amla and centella blended with coconut oil and the healthfulness of goat milk to help treat alopecia and other causes of hair loss. Nourishes the scalp and strengthens hair strands to encourage fresh growth and help diminish greying.

categories.name: Makeup
categories.description: Explore our Makeup Collection. Face For a flawless face, start with a smooth canvas. Explore Face Eyes Play up your best feature with colorful shades and eye-enhancing products that beautify, luminize and define. Explore Eyes Lips Revolutionary formulas provide skincare benefits ...

categories.name: Skin
categories.description: Put your best face forward with high-performance skin care. Our range of skin care products cleanses, treats, moisturizes, & protects with results-driven formulas & powerful ingredients. Thirsty skin? Keep skin hydrated with our hyaluronic acid skin care products. Breaking out? Combat acne with our salicylic acid skin care products. Fine lines & wrinkles giving you a hard time? Alpha hydroxy acids skincare products are your new BFF. For deeper exfoliation browse glycolic acid skin care products or lactic acid skin care products if you have sensitive or dry skin. Can't solve your anti-aging skin puzzle? Let our retinoid skin care products find the missing piece. Don‚Äôt feel like negotiating with your skin when it comes to collagen production? Keep skin firm and tight with our vitamin C skin care products. Who said skin care has to be complicated?

categories.name: Hair
categories.description: Sally Beauty carries a huge selection of salon professional hair care products to keep your hair healthy, clean, and styled at budget-conscious prices. Find shampoo and conditioner, curling irons and flat irons, brushes and combs, and clippers and trimmers to get the style you want today.

reviews.body: I give this product 5 star coz i have been using it for a while now, its been 3 years now using this everyday. But , About the packaging, I got this product it was all dusty packed , too much dust, and the pack did not have seal , the primer was still unsued so decided to keep it. Kindly take care of your packaging services.

It's a fantastic product that completely changed my makeup game since the day I bought it. I no longer have to worry about my large pores or tiny crinkles. In summers I use it before sunscreen and compact power/BB cream. In winters, I use it after moisturizer and before sunscreen. I flake a lot in winters and this miraculously never lets it show. Just make sure that you don't powder a lot in winters. You can simply use this primer after moisturizer and it will make you look photoshopped.

reviews.title: Good moisturizer for hair and skin
reviews.body: I brought it when it was on sale 50% . I used it as leave in conditioner along with wow coconut and avacado conditioner. It made my curl more defined and get good volume apart of its own benefits.  Good moisturizer

reviews.title: lovable product

I use it daily at night before hitting the hay and at morning my skin feels fresh after splashing the water into my skin... Thanks Purple for this product... But it delayed delivery time but the product is pretty good, surely will be buying for the next time

reviews.title: AMAZING HAIR MASK... WUHUUU!
reviews.body: This is the first product which I'M giving 5 stars on purple app reason being its says what it does. it really make my hairs very soft ,silky ,long (SEE AFTER 3 DAYS) and shining I have mixed it with other hair powders which are available on this aap in a Combo set you are gonna love this product just mixed it with those powders including egg yolk aloe vera gel which should be of real aloe vera plant and your gonna rock. if you have no problem with curd you can mix it too. these powders together make a good paste or a mask for your hairs which Really effective for your hairs on a natural way love Alps goodness for this product. if you want  the features which I have mentioned above then buy this product blindly. this will give your hair a salon finished look by using natural products only with no harm. must buy product! !!!

reviews.title: a must try
reviews.body: ps:I have used this for 2 months  so basically I was having a lot of dandruff like I mean dermatitis level one and despite the dermatologist telling oil is not v.good for it many dermatologist had mixed opinion but believe me guys this works for dandruff and makes ur hair soft ..if u read the ingredients (assuming they are true) it's not a mix of one or 2 oil but more than 4 oil which is v.good .. it's cold pressed so no complaints there also ..wow oils are bit pricey tho..but using a little goes a long way ..overall I give a good buy opinion..it is nourishing  affordable 7.5/10 (500‚Çπ for 2 months) if u want a cheaper option go for khadi brahmi oil  quality of ingredient 10/10 effectiveness 9/10 ( results are seen in 2 weeks but go for long term) overall 8.5/10

reviews.title: Best remedy for hair fail
reviews.body: When I saw so good response from others for this oil I thought of trying it. I was suffering from hormonal changes so I had so much of hair fall that I cant describe that in words. I did everything changed shampoo, serum,conditioner, hair spa but nothing worked for me. Finally I thought of trying biotique oil and shampoo both, even  I cant believe my hairfall reduced to 70%  and I have used it only twice. I am very happy. I wish this product quality remains same after long years also. Usually it happens as soon as products get famous they compromise in their quality also. Deserving five stars.
